com.milk.asynch
Class JustReceiver

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.asynch.JustReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Receiver
public final class JustReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Receiver

This is an implementation of Receiver that wraps around another Receiver, and only re-exports the Receiver interface. This allows for better capability confinement (e.g., you don't have to hand an unrestricted MailBox to something that should only be receiving from it).

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1998-1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object receive()
          Retrieve a message out of the Receiver, but if the Receiver is empty, first wait for it to be filled.
 void waitUntilFull()
          Wait for the Receiver to have a message in it, but don't actually retrieve the message.
